BackstoryDef.title: roaming minstrel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the rim with [PAWN_possessive] family, performing traditional poetry for merchants and aristocrats alike. One of these aristocrats took a liking to [PAWN_nameDef], and paid a pretty penny for [PAWN_possessive] subservience. [PAWN_pronoun] was housed and fed by [PAWN_possessive] master, and performed for his guests at social events and royal dinners every evening. [PAWN_pronoun] never saw [PAWN_possessive] family again.

BackstoryDef.title: troubadour
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was schooled at an affluent academy for the creatively gifted. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught not only to sing, but also to fight, and with time, [PAWN_pronoun] became proficient at doing both of these things at the same time.

BackstoryDef.title: rogue
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] would scout the mountaintops for careless travellers who had lost their way. From the bushes, [PAWN_nameDef] would strike, and take whatever those lost lambs' corpses left behind.

BackstoryDef.title: minstrel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] documented [PAWN_possessive] tribe’s history through magnificent poetry. [PAWN_possessive] people would gather around the fire while [PAWN_pronoun] called out from above the flames, reciting tales of life, death and love to all who would listen. \n\nWriting such graphic accounts of war scarred [PAWN_objective] for life.

BackstoryDef.title: gambler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: If [PAWN_nameDef] owned it, [PAWN_nameDef] would wager it; gold coins, animals, alcohol, even [PAWN_possessive] clothes. [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't afraid to risk anything for the chance of a hefty payout. Even today, you'll never find [PAWN_nameDef] without a trusty pack of cards in [PAWN_possessive] pocket.

BackstoryDef.title: entertainer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], with [PAWN_possessive] band of fellow performers, serenaded marketplace patrons with [PAWN_possessive] whimsical tunes. [PAWN_nameDef]’s imaginative ditties told stories of legendary warriors, bovine heroes and their mythical, snake-like foes.

BackstoryDef.title: luthier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] manufactured guitars for a living. From felling the tree that the instrument was carved from, to teaching customers how to play a tune or two before they took their new purchase home, [PAWN_nameDef] was a dab hand at it all.
